about_the_game:
■About “Pastel Kawaii Assets”


This is a resource pack made with an explorative-adventure game in mind, in accordance with the standards of Pixel Game Maker MV. The assets design is centered around a pastel-color themed child’s room in mind, enable users creating games with a cute but modern taste!

◇Asset Content Features◇

・A total of 4 character types: 1 hero and 3 NPC characters, complete with walking and various animations
・Furniture objects like doors and drawers
・Walls and floors designed to feel like a bedroom, as well as assets representing backyards (e.g. sky, grass)
・UI elements such as text windows with character icons and speech bubbles.
Plus many more that suits all your needs to make a cute – (cough) kawaii game space!

◇Detailed Contents◇

・Character：4 types
・UI Elements - window with icons and speech bubble：16 types
・Tiles：8 pieces （512×512px）
・Objects：32 pieces
※Tile type assets are made at 24 x 24 per tile size.
※Some objects are also available as tiles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a resource pack made with an explorative-adventure game in mind, in accordance with the standards of Pixel Game Maker MV. The assets design is centered around a pastel-color themed child’s room in mind, enable users creating games with a cute but modern taste!
